title: Why is it called "The Legend of Zelda"
body:
What does Zelda do that is legendary? I don't think getting captured all the fucking time by ganon counts. 

It should be called The Legend of Link 

Link is the legendary hero of the story that goes into the dungeons, kills all these monsters, kills ganon, saves the princess; etc. Zelda doesn't do anything, but she gets the title 

that's messed up
